Description: This beautifully furnished and decorated townhouse in Needham Heights is meticulously maintained with amenities including central air - just a few blocks from Starbucks, Trader Joe's, Needham Heights Commuter Rail station and more. 3 BR's plus separate dedicated home office. Relaxing 3rd level outdoor balcony off primary bedroom with on suite full bath and spacious walk in closet Two car attached garage and small front yard. One of just three townhouses in the building - other two are owner occupied - minimum four month lease please and longer term optional
